entry.title: 3M VHB UV-PRIMER-4GAL - VHB Tape Universal Primer UV Clear - 4 Gallon (15.1 L) 7100114427
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Primer
Price: 484.49

[shortdesc]

3M VHB Tape Universal Primer UV, PRIMER UV-4 GAL, clear, 4 gal (15.1 L)

  • 3M™ VHB™ Tape Universal Primer UV is a priming solution designed for bonding with 3M™ VHB™ Tapes
  • It enables strong, durable bonds on surfaces like polypropylene, ABS, PET/PBT blends and other difficult to stick to substrates while improving a manufacturer’s approach to safe operations.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line VHB
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Primer
    Volume 4 Gallon, 15.1 L

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ VHB™ Tape Universal Primer UV can be used to promote adhesion of 3M™ VHB™ Tapes to surfaces such as ABS, PET/PBT blends, concrete, wood, glass, metal, and painted metal.

    • Product Information

  • Promotes adhesion to polypropylene, ABS, PET/PBT (polymer and plastic) blends, and other difficult to stick to substrates
  • Increased use of environmentally concious materials promoting health and safety
  • UV indicator verifies primer application, reducing priming errors and increasing quality control
  • Quick dry time speeds process and increases throughput
  • Can be applied with brush, swab, felt-tipped dauber bottle applicator, knurled roller or similar type of equipment
  • Cleans up with acetone
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld 3901-1/2PT - Metal Primer 3901 in Red - (237 ml) 7000000907
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesive Primers
Price: 89.75

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Metal Primer, 3901, red, 237 ml

  • 3M™ Scotch-Weld™ Metal Primer is a primer designed for applications using 3M™ Scotch-Weld™ Structural Adhesives
  • This film and liquid adhesive primer is able to improve metal and glass adhesion
  • Additional features of this primer include improved corrosion protection and resistance to environmental exposure for metal.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Red
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Adhesive Primers
    Volume 8 fl. Oz, 236 ml

    Product Information

  • Helps improve glass and metal adhesion and offers resistance to environmental exposure for epoxy and urethane structural adhesives
  • Offers improved corrosion protection to metal for long-lasting performance
  • Protects cleaned surfaces until bonding operations can be completed
  • Helps ensure complete wetting of film adhesive to adhered surfaces
  • Easy application and fast-drying

    • Suggested Application

  • Applications requiring metal and glass adhesion
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch-Weld AC79-8OZ - Instant Adhesive Primer AC79 in Clear - 8 fl. Oz (236 ml) bottle 7100039264
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesive Primers
Price: 50.27

[shortdesc]

3M Scotch-Weld Instant Adhesive Primer, AC79, clear, 8 fl. oz. (236 ml) bottle

  • 3M™ Scotch-Weld™ Instant Adhesive Primer is designed for use on difficult-to-bond, low surface energy elastomers, such as EPDM, silicone, and other rubbers
  • Surface preparation and application are straightforward and the adhesive primer is fast drying to keep jobs moving quickly.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch-Weld
    Color Clear
    Origin Country United Kingdom
    Product Type Adhesive Primers
    Volume 8 fl. Oz, 236 ml

    Product Information

  • Helps improves adhesion on flexible elastomers, including rubbers, such as silicone, fluoroelastomers, EPDM, and TPE
  • Dries fast to keep jobs moving quickly
  • Contains cure accelerator
  • Straightforward surface preparation and easy application

    • Suggested Application

  • Bonds to elastomeric substrates
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Adhesive Primers
Price: 99.98

[shortdesc]

3M Metal Primer P592 Clear, 250 mL Bottle, 12 per case

  • 3M™ Metal Primer P592 is a colourless primer designed to improve the adhesion of 3M™ Adhesive Sealants on steel, anodized aluminum and galvanized metal.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Clear
    Origin Country France
    Product Type Adhesive Primers
    Volume 8.5 fl. Oz, 250 ml

    Product Information

  • Helps promotes adhesion and improves bond integrity
  • Low viscosity, one component enables easy application
  • Best used for anodized aluminum, steel and galvanized metal
  • Colour: Clear

    • Suggested Application

  • Designed to improve the adhesion of 3M™ Adhesive Sealants on steel, anodized aluminum and galvanized metal
